content: PFF Panel 3 Investments Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019Is poems better or vickers in terms of small amt like 200 to 400 a month?3 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 03 Mar 2019The charges may eat significantly into your returns if your base capital is so low because of minimum fees. Hence, for smaller amounts, a regular shares savings plan might be better. You can read this for more info: https://www.sgbudgetbabe.com/2019/03/regular-shares-savings-plans-super-simple-method-to-invest.html0 comments0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 02 Mar 2019For small amounts you might want to consider Bank's regular savings/investment plans, FSM platform, robo advisors.0 comments0
Elvis NgLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 02 Mar 2019Check on the charges. And also depends on what you want to invest in, individual stocks or ETF.0 comments0
